titleStmt.title: The life and opinions of Tristram Shandy, Gentleman: TEI edition

div.head: Chap. I
div.p: I wish either my father or my mother, or indeed both of them, as they were in duty both equally bound to it, had minded what they were about when they begot me; ...

div.head: Chap. II
div.p: — Then, positively, there is nothing in the question, that I can see, either good or bad. — Then let me tell you, Sir, it was a very unseasonable question at least ...
